description.zh-cn: 香港资深歌手、演员及节目主持人，1960年代中期出道，是无线电视第一批签约艺人，也是《欢乐今宵》的早期台柱之一。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong singer, actress, and host who debuted in the mid-1960s. She was one of the first artists signed by TVB and an early pillar of the show 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight'.

description.zh-cn: 国际武打巨星李小龙的弟弟，森森的前夫。
description.en: The younger brother of international martial arts superstar Bruce Lee and the ex-husband of Sum Sum.

description.zh-cn: 居于澳门的商人，森森的现任丈夫。
description.en: A Macau-based businessman and the current husband of Sum Sum.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，森森的胞妹。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist and the younger sister of Sum Sum.

description.zh-cn: 森森与前夫李振辉的儿子。
description.en: The son of Sum Sum and her ex-husband Robert Lee.

description.zh-cn: 森森曾就读的小学。
description.en: The primary school that Sum Sum attended.

description.zh-cn: 森森曾就读的中学。
description.en: The secondary school that Sum Sum attended.

description.zh-cn: 香港前电视台，为亚洲电视的前身。森森曾于1966年至1970年间为其合约艺人。
description.en: A former Hong Kong television station, the predecessor to Asia Television. Sum Sum was a contract artist for the station from 1966 to 1970.

description.zh-cn: 香港主要的电视台之一。森森曾于1970年至1983年间为其合约艺人。
description.en: One of the major television stations in Hong Kong. Sum Sum was a contract artist for the station from 1970 to 1983.

description.zh-cn: 香港前电视台。森森曾于1983年至1992年及2005年至2006年间为其合约艺人。
description.en: A former Hong Kong television station. Sum Sum was a contract artist for the station from 1983 to 1992 and from 2005 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 香港无线电视的长寿综艺节目，森森是该节目的早期台柱之一。
description.en: A long-running variety show on Hong Kong's TVB, of which Sum Sum was one of the early pillars.

description.zh-cn: 由森森与胞妹斑斑于1973年组成的合唱团。
description.en: A singing group formed in 1973 by Sum Sum and her younger sister Ban Ban.

description.zh-cn: 1966年由森森、斑斑及四位男士组成的业余乐团。
description.en: An amateur band formed in 1966 by Sum Sum, Ban Ban, and four male members.

description.zh-cn: 由丽的映声于1966年开办的第一届艺员训练班。
description.en: The first artist training class launched by Rediffusion Television in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，与森森同为丽的映声第一届艺员训练班的毕业生。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist and a fellow graduate with Sum Sum from the first Rediffusion Television artist training class.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手，与森森同为丽的映声第一届艺员训练班的毕业生。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and a fellow graduate with Sum Sum from the first Rediffusion Television artist training class.

description.zh-cn: 香港电视制作人，因赏识森森并邀请其加入《欢乐今宵》而对她的演艺生涯起到重要推动作用。
description.en: A Hong Kong television producer who played a key role in Sum Sum's career by appreciating her talent and inviting her to join 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight'.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、歌手，曾与森森有过一段恋情。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor and singer who was once in a romantic relationship with Sum Sum.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，森森曾托她将分手信转交给郑少秋。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist whom Sum Sum entrusted to deliver a breakup letter to Adam Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 国际武打巨星，李振辉的哥哥。他曾指点森森截拳道。
description.en: An international martial arts superstar and the older brother of Robert Lee. He once instructed Sum Sum in Jeet Kune Do.

description.zh-cn: 由森森、斑斑、樱樱、菁菁组成的四人女子歌唱团体。
description.en: A four-member female singing group composed of Sum Sum, Ban Ban, Ying Ying, and Jing Jing.

description.zh-cn: 1976年由无线电视促成的乐队，成员包括森森、李振辉、斑斑和贾思乐。
description.en: A band formed by TVB in 1976, with members including Sum Sum, Robert Lee, Ban Ban, and Louis Castro.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，“四乐士”乐队成员之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist and a member of the band 'The Four Lads'.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，曾与森森及斑斑有过恋情。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor who was romantically involved with both Sum Sum and Ban Ban.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，是森森的好友，并撮合了森森与王宗德的婚姻。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist, a good friend of Sum Sum, who acted as a matchmaker for her marriage to Wang Zongde.

description.zh-cn: 森森的出生地及主要演艺生涯地点。
description.en: Sum Sum's birthplace and the primary location of her entertainment career.

description.zh-cn: 森森1992年再婚后的移居地。
description.en: The place where Sum Sum moved after her remarriage in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 森森于1951年6月23日出生于香港。
description.en: Sum Sum was born in Hong Kong on June 23, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 森森与李振辉于1977年12月结婚，1983年离婚。
description.en: Sum Sum and Robert Lee were married in December 1977 and divorced in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 森森于1992年12月23日与商人王宗德结婚，并移居澳门。
description.en: Sum Sum married businessman Wang Zongde on December 23, 1992, and moved to Macau.

description.zh-cn: 李嘉豪是森森与前夫李振辉于1980年在香港所生的儿子。
description.en: Li Jiahao is the son of Sum Sum and her ex-husband Robert Lee, born in Hong Kong in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 李嘉豪是李振辉与前妻森森于1980年在香港所生的儿子。
description.en: Li Jiahao is the son of Robert Lee and his ex-wife Sum Sum, born in Hong Kong in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 森森是斑斑的胞姐。
description.en: Sum Sum is Ban Ban's older sister.

description.zh-cn: 森森毕业于救恩学校小学部。
description.en: Sum Sum graduated from the primary school section of Kau Yan School.

description.zh-cn: 森森是新法书院的校友。
description.en: Sum Sum is an alumna of New Method College.

description.zh-cn: 1966年，森森参加了丽的映声举办的第一届艺员训练班。
description.en: In 1966, Sum Sum attended the first artist training class organized by Rediffusion Television.

description.zh-cn: 森森于1966年至1970年间为丽的映声的合约艺人。
description.en: Sum Sum was a contract artist for Rediffusion Television from 1966 to 1970.

description.zh-cn: 森森于1970年至1983年间为无线电视的合约艺人。
description.en: Sum Sum was a contract artist for TVB from 1970 to 1983.

description.zh-cn: 森森曾两度加入亚洲电视，分别为1983年至1992年和2005年至2006年。
description.en: Sum Sum joined Asia Television on two separate occasions, from 1983 to 1992 and from 2005 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 1967年秋，蔡和平赏识赢得“香港歌后”荣衔的森森，并邀请她加入无线电视《欢乐今宵》节目，推动了她的演艺事业发展。
description.en: In the autumn of 1967, Robert Chua appreciated Sum Sum after she won the 'Hong Kong Song Queen' title and invited her to join TVB's 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight', which boosted her career in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 森森与郑少秋因在《欢乐今宵》合作而传出绯闻，恋情于1974年2月结束。
description.en: Sum Sum and Adam Cheng were rumored to be in a relationship after collaborating on 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight'; the relationship ended in February 1974.

description.zh-cn: 森森曾委托沈殿霞将给郑少秋的分手信送达，显示两人有一定交情。
description.en: Sum Sum once entrusted Lydia Shum to deliver a breakup letter to Adam Cheng, indicating a degree of friendship between them.

description.zh-cn: 1972年，森森曾得到李小龙的截拳道指点，构成了一种非正式的师徒关系。
description.en: In 1972, Sum Sum received instruction in Jeet Kune Do from Bruce Lee, forming an informal student-teacher relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1966年，森森与妹妹斑斑及四位男士共同组成业余乐团“BumbleBees”。
description.en: In 1966, Sum Sum, along with her sister Ban Ban and four male members, co-founded the amateur band 'BumbleBees'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年，斑斑与姐姐森森及四位男士共同组成业余乐团“BumbleBees”。
description.en: In 1966, Ban Ban, along with her sister Sum Sum and four male members, co-founded the amateur band 'BumbleBees'.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，森森与妹妹斑斑组成“森森斑斑合唱团”。
description.en: In 1973, Sum Sum and her sister Ban Ban formed the 'Sum Sum Ban Ban Group'.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，斑斑与姐姐森森组成“森森斑斑合唱团”。
description.en: In 1973, Ban Ban and her sister Sum Sum formed the 'Sum Sum Ban Ban Group'.

description.zh-cn: 1972至1975年间，森森与斑斑、樱樱、菁菁组成“森森玉女歌唱团”。
description.en: Between 1972 and 1975, Sum Sum, along with Ban Ban, Ying Ying, and Jing Jing, formed the 'Sum Sum Jade Girls Singing Group'.

description.zh-cn: 1972至1975年间，斑斑与森森、樱樱、菁菁组成“森森玉女歌唱团”。
description.en: Between 1972 and 1975, Ban Ban, along with Sum Sum, Ying Ying, and Jing Jing, formed the 'Sum Sum Jade Girls Singing Group'.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，森森成为由无线电视促成的“四乐士”乐队成员之一。
description.en: In 1976, Sum Sum became a member of the band 'The Four Lads', which was formed by TVB.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，李振辉成为由无线电视促成的“四乐士”乐队成员之一。
description.en: In 1976, Robert Lee became a member of the band 'The Four Lads', which was formed by TVB.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，斑斑成为由无线电视促成的“四乐士”乐队成员之一。
description.en: In 1976, Ban Ban became a member of the band 'The Four Lads', which was formed by TVB.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，贾思乐成为由无线电视促成的“四乐士”乐队成员之一。
description.en: In 1976, Louis Castro became a member of the band 'The Four Lads', which was formed by TVB.

description.zh-cn: 森森曾与罗石青有过一段情，罗于1992年7月26日因病自杀。
description.en: Sum Sum had a past relationship with Lo Sek-ching, who committed suicide due to illness on July 26, 1992.

description.zh-cn: 斑斑曾与罗石青有过一段情，罗于1992年7月26日因病自杀。
description.en: Ban Ban had a past relationship with Lo Sek-ching, who committed suicide due to illness on July 26, 1992.

description.zh-cn: 李司棋是森森的好友，并撮合了她与王宗德的婚姻。
description.en: Louise Lee is a good friend of Sum Sum and acted as a matchmaker for her marriage to Wang Zongde.
